sentences.sContent: Williams is obsessive about motor racing.

synos.tran: 强迫性的；着迷的；分神的

words.tran: 过分地；着迷地，着魔似地
痴迷；困扰；[内科][心理] 强迫观念
迷住，缠住；使…着迷；使…困扰

trans.tranCn: 强迫性的， 急迫的； 使人着迷的
trans.tranOther: If someone's behaviour is obsessive, they cannot stop doing a particular thing or behaving in a particular way
